name: Unity in Action - first person shooter
name_original: Unity in Action - first person shooter
description:
This is the project created in Chapter 3 of my book Unity in Action. You're taught how to move in first-person with keyboard controls, look around with the mouse, collide with walls, shoot, etc.

WASD or arrow keys to move around
mouse to look around and shoot

(you may need to click the game window first)
